data.title: Who Is Christina Aguilera

data.text:
Christina Aguilera Biography

Christina Aguilera is an American singer, songwriter, actress and television personality. She was born in Staten Island, New York in 1980. Aguilera rose to fame in the late 1990s and early 2000s as a teenager with her debut album "Christina Aguilera" which included hit singles like "Genie in a Bottle," "What a Girl Wants," and "Come On Over Baby (All I Want Is You)". Her follow-up albums, "Mi Reflejo" and "My Kind of Christmas" solidified her Latin-pop influence, and "Stripped" (2002) marked a departure from her bubblegum pop past and showcased a more mature image and sound.

Her fourth studio album, "Back to Basics" (2006) earned her critical acclaim and a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance. Aguilera has sold over 75 million records worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time. She has won numerous awards throughout her career, including five Grammy Awards, one Latin Grammy Award, and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. In addition to her music career, Aguilera has also dabbled in acting, including a role in the film "Burlesque" and as a coach on the singing competition show "The Voice".

Christina Aguilera Fast Facts

Christina Aguilera is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. Some facts about her include:

* She was born in Staten Island, New York City, in 1980.

* She began her career in the 1990s as a cast member on the Disney Channel television series "The Mickey Mouse Club."

* She released her self-titled debut album in 1999, which featured the hit singles "Genie in a Bottle," "What a Girl Wants," and "Come On Over Baby (All I Want Is You)."

* In 2002, she released her second album "Stripped" which featured the hit singles "Dirrty," "Beautiful," and "Fighter."

* Aguilera has been recognized as a pop icon and has been referred to as the "Princess of Pop."

* She has sold over 75 million records worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.

* She has won numerous awards, including five Grammy Awards, one Latin Grammy Award, and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

* She has also been involved in a number of philanthropic endeavors, including her work as a global ambassador for the World Food Programme, and her support of various other charitable organizations.

* Aguilera has also appeared in a number of films and television shows, including "Burlesque" and "The Voice" as a coach.

Christina Aguilera Top Quotes

"It's been quite a roller coaster ride, but I've grown and learned a lot about myself. The greatest thing is being able to interact with fans and touch people's lives... for that I give thanks."

"I was known as the little girl with the big voice."

"I'm not really religious but very spiritual. I give money to this company that manufactures hearing aids on a regular basis. More people should really hear me sing. I have a gift from God."

"I think it's really great when you stand up for something that you really believe, even if you get heat for it."

"My mom brought me up to believe that my talent is a gift and a blessing."

― Christina Aguilera Quotes
